actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the formula for cost-of-living adjustments of annuities under the civil service retirement system.

summary.text: Eliminates the one percent increase which is added to cost of living adjustments of Federal civil service annuities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the formula for cost-of-living adjustments of annuities under the civil service retirement system.
